channel.title: Random dc's? please help i need bad losing people
channel.description:
ok on my server i get this in the run.bat [code] java.lang.NullPointerException at client.sendFrame126(client.java:16965) at special.specialAttacks(special.java:116) at client.specAttack(client.java:2730) at client.AttackNPC(client.java:5799) at client.process(client.java:15512) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:270) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Connection from 80.63.56.149:34789 Connection from 78.142.140.194:53425 Connection from adsl-75-48-4-115.dsl.scrm01.sbcglobal.net:64667 Connection from host86-150-97-159.range86-150.btcentralplus.com:56388 Connection from adsl-072-148-083-160.sip.jax.bellsouth.net:49880 [client-7-S k y]: Loading Process Completed [Regular player, lag: 0 ms] Disconnecting bugged player null ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (78.142.140.194) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (80.63.56.149) [/code]
anyone familiar with this?
